task.title: Use a NetApp Data ONTAP SAN
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to configure the NetApp Data ONTAP SAN block storage backend on the Storage Controller (SC).

taskbody.context: Eucalyptus supports both NetApp Clustered Data ONTAP and traditional Data ONTAP 7-mode SANs. NetApp Vservers and 7-mode Filers are managed by Eucalyptus using NetApp Manageability Software Development Kit (NMSDK) and Data ONTAP APIs.
